subject: French Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: On Sunday at Roland Garros, it will be Roger Federer versus Rafael Nadal, No. 1 versus No. 2, one of the best players in history versus the best in the world on clay.
snippet: On Sunday at Roland Garros, it will be Roger Federer versus Rafael Nadal, No. 1 versus No. 2, one of the best players in history versus the best in the world on clay.
